section.name: Snapshot builds
section.p: The Tapestry snapshot builds are currently available via the ibiblio maven2 and apache.org snapshot repositories. To download the current 4.1.2-SNAPSHOT release you shouldn't need to change your pom settings at all, other than including the right artifacts to download Tapestry.
In order to download the snapshot release versions of Tapestry you will need to add the following repository to your project's pom (if not already present):

span.p: Anything released to the snapshot repositories will be under active development and should not be considered stable.
